title: In the Cleft Joy Comes In the Mourning:  A Story of Hope After Tragedy
description: In the Cleft: Joy Comes in the Mourning is a mother's story of her family's journey through tragedy and how she coped after losing a husband, a son and a mother-in-law to cancer. Goodman speaks with raw honesty about her crisis of faith, her depression and finally, with God's help, how she was able to emerge back into the light to find God's love and miracles while on a mission trip in Africa.
author: Dana Goodman
